nodes.text: Nelhal Industries was a company that produced the RGB photoreceptor lens used by Industrial Automaton in the design of their R2-series astromech droids. One of that series' most famous units, R2-D2, was fitted with these lenses, in conjunction with Stears Data multifunctional optical readers.
The company is named for Nelson Hall, model builder and one of three "official" R2 operators.[source?]
